Extensions.​math

Extension functions for the math library.

Functions
Sign
function math.Sign(
value
)

Returns the sign of a number.

Parameters
number value

The number to get the sign for.

Returns
number

The sign of the value. This is either 0 for a value of 0, -1 for a negative number or 1 for a positive number.

InRange
function math.InRange(
value,
min,
max
)

Checks whether a number falls within a specific inclusive range.

Parameters
number value

The number to check.

number min

The minimum value to compare against.

number max

The maximum value to compare against.

Returns
bool

Whether the number lies within the provided range.

ClampedRemap
function math.ClampedRemap(
value,
inMin,
inMax,
outMin,
outMax
)

Combines the functionality of math.Remap and math.Clamp.

Parameters
number value

The number to remap.

number inMin

The minimum of the initial range.

number inMax

The maximum of the initial range.

number outMin

The minimum of the new range.

number outMax

The maximum of the new range.

Returns
number

The number, remapped to the new range and clamped between it's values.

Maybe
function math.Maybe(
percentage
)

Performs a simple random percentage roll.

Parameters
number percentage

The percentage chance of returning true.

Returns
bool

Whether the roll has succeeded.
